title: Oil Steadies After Two-Day Drop With Glut Concerns to the Fore
description: Oil held the biggest two-day drop in a month as concerns about global oversupply continued to weigh on sentiment.
content: Oil held the biggest two-day drop in a month as concerns about global oversupply continued to weigh on sentiment.
